DOC.brief_summary: Primary Objective : To test 600 mg clopidogrel load dose administer ≥ 6 ≤ 24 hour prior PCI produce great decrease periprocedural release biochemical marker ( CK , CK-MB , troponin-T and/or I ) myocardial necrosis , compare 300 mg load dose , give ≥ 6 ≤ 24 hour prior PCI 600 mg load dose clopidogrel , administer immediately ( ≤ 45 minute ) PCI .
DOC.brief_title: CASTLE ( Clopidogrel And Serum Troponin Level Elevation )
DOC.criteria: Patients symptomatic coronary artery disease objective evidence ischemia ( eg , symptoms angina pectoris , positive stress test result dynamic electrocardiographic ( ECG ) change ) . Patients undergoing stent implantation Any known contraindication use aspirin clopidogrel . Patients receive clopidogrel within 10 day , thrombolytic within 24 hour receive oral anticoagulation therapy Elective administration IIb/IIIa inhibitor . Cardiogenic shock Acute MI < 24 hour BP systolic < 100 mmHg Left ventricular ejection fraction < 30 % Heart failure , NYHA class III IV Severe renal insufficiency ( creatinine > 3.0 mg/dL ) Platelet count < 100,000/mm³ Target lesion venous bypass graft Target lesion chronic occlusion The information intend contain consideration relevant patient 's potential participation clinical trial .
